original: Löthner, Olof August, lagman, Jönköping, f. 24/10/85 i Kristinehamn av brukspatr. Carl L. o. Anna Pollack. G. 20 m. Elise (Lisa) Sofia Enstedt. — Mog:ex. i Karlstad 05, jur. kand. i Upps. 09. E. o. not. i Svea hovr. 09, i Göta hovr. 12, tingstjg. i Öster-sysslets samt Lysings’ o. Göstrings doms. 10-12, tjg. i Göta hovr. sed. 12, tf. fiskal 13, e. o. as’sesisor 14, ass^essor 17, fiskal 19’, hovr:råd 23, div :ordf. 39, lagm;an 47. Led. av folksk:styr. 27, stadsfullm. (h.) 31, kyrkofullm. o. kyrkoråd 32, drätselkamm. 35 riksd. första kamm. 46, ordf. i Jönköp. RK-distr. samt styr. f. Jönköp. Stads o. Läns Sparbank, v. ordf. i direkt, f. Ryhovs sjukh. o. statens anst. f. fallandesjuka, insp. f. Huskvarna samrealsk. KNO-2kl, SvRKGM.
translated: Löthner, Olof August, district judge, Jönköping, born on October 24th, 1885 in Kristinehamn to Ironmaster Carl L. and Anna Pollack. Married on October 20th to Elise (Lisa) Sofia Enstedt. - Graduated from Karlstad in 1905, received a law degree from Uppsala in 1909. Served as assistant clerk at Svea Court of Appeal in 1909, at Göta Court of Appeal in 1912, as court official at Öster-sysslet's, Lysings', and Göstrings' district courts from 1910 to 1912. Continued working at Göta Court of Appeal since 1912, appointed temporary prosecutor in 1913, deputy district court judge in 1914, district court judge in 1917, prosecutor in 1919, councilor of court in 1923, division chairman in 1939, district judge since 1947. Member of the school board since 1927, city councilor (h.) since 1931, member of the church board and church council since 1932, member of the municipal finance committee since 1935. Representative in the first chamber of parliament in 1946, chairman of the Jönköping RK district and the board of Jönköping City and County Savings Bank, vice-chairman of the board for Ryhov Hospital and the state's institute for epilepsy, inspector for Huskvarna secondary school. Knight of the Order of the North Star, second class, and the Grand Cross of the Ancient Noble Knights of Horn.

recipientOf.name: Jönköping City and County Savings Bank
